SEARCH
Package edu.riccardomori.wordle.client.backend

Class ClientBackend

java.lang.Object
edu.riccardomori.wordle.client.backend.ClientBackend
public class ClientBackend extends Object
Client backend that handles all the communication with the server through the TCP socket. It also manages the subscription to the remote callback for the notifications about the leadeboard

    • startGame

      public GameDescriptor startGame() throws GenericError, IOError, AlreadyPlayedException
      Sends the PLAY message to server to start a new game. It returns a game descriptor
      Returns:
      GameDescriptor containing the size of the secret word and the number of availables tries
      Throws:
      GenericError
      IOError
      AlreadyPlayedException

      Send a word to the server trying to guess the secret word
      Parameters:

      Returns:
